plot: Cosmonauts land on the planet Venus. However, they find themselves in danger from the voracious monsters they find on it.
title: El planeta de las tormentas
plot_es: Cosmonauts land on the planet Venus. However, they find themselves in danger from the voracious monsters they find on it.
plot_en: Cosmonauts land on the planet Venus. However, they find themselves in danger from the voracious monsters they find on it.
